title: Emotional Music Pack - Shining Bells
description: Add enchanting bell sounds to your game with 'Shining Bells', the latest music pack from Elven Net. Enhance your game's audio today!
longDescription:
Elevate your game's audio to the next level with 'Shining Bells', the latest music pack from Elven Net. Featuring 10 original compositions, each track in this pack is infused with the delicate sound of bells, creating a soothing and calming atmosphere that will transport your players to a place of serenity and relaxation. Whether you're developing a game set in a tranquil forest or a peaceful puzzle game, 'Shining Bells' is the perfect soundtrack to accompany your gameplay. With its blend of acoustic and synth sound, this music pack is versatile enough to suit a variety of game genres and settings. Plus, the high-quality production ensures that your players will be immersed in a world of enchanting sounds. Enhance your game's audio with 'Shining Bells' today and give your players an unforgettable auditory experience!


Check it out on Youtube!
technicalDetails:
Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz, 16bit

Does music loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 30 mins 17 sec

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
